item.title: Dick Cheney's death a loss to the nation, says George W Bush
item.description: Cheney became one of the most powerful vice-presidents in US history under Bush, and was a key architect in his "war on terror".

item.title: Iran releases two French nationals from detention
item.description: CÃ©cile Kohler and Jacques Paris are thought to have been the last French people held in Iran.

item.title: Israel receives coffin Hamas says contains Gaza hostage's body
item.description: Israeli forces will now transfer the remains to the National Centre of Forensic Medicine in Tel Aviv for identification.

item.title: Zelensky visits troops near embattled front line town of Pokrovsk
item.description: Fierce battles are taking place in the Donetsk town that Russia has been trying to occupy for over a year.

item.title: Narco-sub carrying 1.7 tonnes of cocaine seized in Atlantic
item.description: The semi-submersible vessel was bound for various European countries, officials say.
